titles.title: Providing that Saudi Arabia should cooperate fully to find and bring to justice those involved in the terrorist attack of May 13, 2003, and for other purposes.
Providing that Saudi Arabia should cooperate fully to find and bring to justice those involved in the terrorist attack of May 13, 2003, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary:
Expresses sympathy to the families of those killed in the terrorist attack in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, on May 13, 2003.
Urges the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia to cooperate fully to help track down and bring to justice all those who carried out or abetted such attack.
